title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 2.1 - Hunting hours for deer and bear
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 2.1 - Hunting hours for deer and bear

State Regulations

During any hunting season established by law or fixed by
order of the department for deer or bear, hunting hours daily shall be from 30
minutes before sunrise to 30 minutes after sunset. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
